org.trimou.engine.resolver

Class TransformResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trimou.engine.config.AbstractConfigurationAware
      • org.trimou.engine.resolver.AbstractResolver
        • org.trimou.engine.resolver.i18n.LocaleAwareResolver
          • org.trimou.engine.resolver.TransformResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationAware, WithPriority, EnhancedResolver, Resolver, Transformer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DateTimeFormatResolver, DummyTransformResolver, NumberFormatResolver

    public class TransformResolver
extends LocaleAwareResolver
implements Transformer
    This resolver performs some kind of transformation when matched (e.g. formats the given context object based on the given name). The transformation is performed by a separate Transformer instance or by the resolver itself.
    Author:
    Martin Kouba

    • Method Detail

      • resolve

        public Object resolve(Object contextObject,
                      String name,
                      ResolutionContext context)
        Description copied from interface: Resolver
        Resolve the value from specified context object and name. This method should return as fast as possible. The best practice is to verify params first and return null in case of the resolver is not capable of resolving it.

        ResolutionContext allows to register a callback to release all the relevant resources after the resolved value is used.

        Specified by:
        resolve in interface Resolver
        Parameters:
        contextObject - The current context object (aka base object), may be null
        name - The name (the key or its part) is never null
        context - The current resolution context
        Returns:
        the resolved object or null
        See Also:
        Placeholder.NULL

      • transform

        public Object transform(Object contextObject,

                        ResolutionContext context)
        Specified by:
        transform in interface Transformer
        Returns:
        the transformed object
